title: William 26
content:
Hey guys,   
   
Sharing a font concept. Kinda a hybrid font that lives somewhere (vaguely) in a dark corner between neohumanist sans-serif and blackletter frakturs combined with a healthy dose of experimentation.   
   
Hope you like!   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017082239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/6847.gif)
author: gatorage

comments.content: I'm diggin' the idea, and it looks cool... the "s" with the full line is killer, but I'm not so sure that the tail on the T is working. It adds an interesting element, but in regular type it gets a little distracting. Maybe keep it as an alternate. Overall, though, it looks cool.
